title: A Ride to Desire
description: This version is no longer publishedYoung English woman, Georgina Harris, is bored of her job and bored of her life. It's during a particularly bad day that she impulsively books a horse riding experience vacation in Montana. It's here that she meets the charismatic and gorgeous, Dade Hudson, a handsome cowboy who helps her discover herself once again. A cowboy who takes her on the ride of her life.... a ride to desire.
author: K.B. Mallion
